inclusion.criterion: Age > 18 years at the time of signing the informed consent form.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Multiple myeloma with Durie-Salmon stage II or III and considered to have disease progression after at least 1 previous anti-myeloma regimen.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must have not have recieved more than 3 previous anti-myeloma regimens and must be relapsed or refractory following at least one regimen of anti-myeloma therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have measurable levels of myeloma paraprotein in serum (>0.5 g/dl) or urine (>0.2 g excreted in a 24-hour collection sample).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status score of 0, 1 or 2.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must have a negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 7 days of starting each cycle. Men and WCBP must agree to use adequate contraceptive methods.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must have a 2-d echocardiogram indicating LVEF ≥ 55% within 42 days prior to first dose of study drug.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any of the following laboratory abnormalities Absolute neutrophil count (ANC) <1500/mm3 (1x109/L).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior history of any other malignancies except for adequately treated basal cell, insitu cervical or breast cancer or other for which the patient has been disease free for 5 years.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with relapse and is on hemodialysis. She has a history of hypercalcemia, but was treated with pamidronate and dialysis. The patient's life expectancy is unknown.
